attributes.title: Mia and Tyler's European Vacation - #1
attributes.caption: Sportsball is back!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at https://bitly.is/2JvfE11. In this inaugural episode of Sportsball, Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the World Cup Final, Tour de France, and BDE. This episode originally aired on July 16, 2018.

attributes.title: Kawhi, Tiger, and Buckeyes, Oh My - #2
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss NBA free agency, Tiger Woods, the Ohio State scandal, and more.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2NFPpro. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa are back to talk in depth about the Kawhi Leonard trade, Tiger Woods and his finish in the British Open, the best sports sounds, Bryce Harper and the Homerun Derby, the Ohio State scandal, and much more.
attributes.display_title: Kawhi, Tiger, and Buckeyes, Oh My - #2

attributes.title: Baker Mayfield's Bus - #3
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the Cleveland Browns, best BCS Champion teams, the MLB, and more.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2M23PRX. Tyler and Mia talk about Baker Mayfield getting a bus, the Cleveland Browns' chances of a winning season, the best BCS Champion ever, the state of baseball and the MLB, and an embarrassing video from a Dodgers and Braves game. Find the shirt Chase Utley was wearing at https://108stitches.com.

attributes.title: Ohio State Scandal - #4
attributes.caption: Tyler and Mia talk about the Urban Meyer revelation at Ohio State, the Mets losing 25-4 and other worst sporting experiences, Johnny Manziel's four interception performance in the CFL, NFL Hall of Fame inductees, and much more!
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2M4Onba. Tyler and Mia talk about the Urban Meyer revelation at Ohio State, the Mets losing 25-4 and other worst sporting experiences, Johnny Manziel's four interception performance in the CFL, NFL Hall of Fame inductees, and much more!

Urban Meyer video courtesy of Single Shot.

attributes.title: The Maryland Football Team Scandal - #5
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the Maryland football scandal, the latest on Ohio State, Tiger Woods, and baseball ejections.
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2B7dplA. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the Maryland football scandal, the latest on Ohio State, Tiger Woods, and baseball ejections.

Tyler and Mia talk about the investigation into the death of Maryland football player Jordan McNair, a report on Tom Herman's connection to the Ohio State scandal, Tiger Woods finishing second, and umpires ejecting players in the MLB and the minor leagues.

attributes.title: Is The NFL In Trouble? - #6
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss Zach Smith, Jalen Ramsey's comments, the NFL helmet rule, and more!
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2N4VSfB. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss Zach Smith, Jalen Ramsey's comments, the NFL helmet rule, and the Coaches Poll.

Tyler and Mia talk about Zach Smith's strange office purchases, Jalen Ramsey destroying NFL quarterbacks, the new NFL helmet rule and its ramifications, the Coaches Poll Top 25, and more!

Read the Jalen Ramsey interview here: https://www.gq.com/story/jalen-ramsey-trash-talk-nfl-interview

attributes.title: College Football Is Back! - #7
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss what's hot in sports, preview the first week of college football, make predictions for the season, and weigh in on Ohio State and Urban Meyer.
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2PdZQ6l. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss what's hot in sports, preview the first week of college football, make predictions for the season, and weigh in on Ohio State and Urban Meyer.

Tyler and Mia also talk about the Oakland A's, Baker Mayfield's photoshoot, Serena Williams' catsuit, Adrian Peterson hype, the return of NCAA football, and much more. This episode was recorded August 27th.

See Tyler's appearance at Kinda Funny at http://bit.ly/TylerOnKF.

attributes.title: Nike Takes A Knee? - #8
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the first weekend of college football, what's got them hot and bothered, Nike's new ad campaign, and the Oakland A's hotstreak, and more.
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2MLHxsr. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss the first weekend of college football, what's got them hot and bothered, Nike's new ad campaign, and the Oakland A's hotstreak.

Tyler and Mia also talk about the media and Nick Saban, NFL Redzone, Texas and Tennessee, Michigan and Jim Harbaugh, Colin Kaepernick teaming up with Nike, moneyball, and more! This episode was recorded September 4, 2018.

attributes.title: What Happened with Serena Williams? - #9
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss week two of college football, NFL, first sports experiences, Serena Williams, and more!
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2O4odmz. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss week two of college football, NFL, first sports experiences, Serena Williams, and more!

Tyler and Mia also talk about Kansas and Kentucky snapping losing streaks, fantasy football, and are joined by Jack Pattillo to make picks. This episode was recorded September 10, 2018.

attributes.title: Mia Flies the Coop - #10
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss week three of college football, NFL, best quitting experiences, USA/Mexico Soccer, and more!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at https://bit.ly/2xmm3Z7. Tyler Coe and Mia Khalifa discuss week three of college football, NFL, best quitting experiences, USA/Mexico Soccer, and more! Tyler and Mia also talk about the Bill's Vontae David quitting and more! This episode was recorded September 17, 2018.

attributes.title: The Return of Jack Pattillo - #11
attributes.caption: Jack Pattillo returns to Sportsball to talk with Tyler Coe about College Football, the MLB Playoffs, great 90s sports movies and so much more.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2xwElXV.  Pattillo returns to Sportsball to talk with Tyler Coe about College Football, the MLB Playoffs, great 90s sports movies and so much more.

attributes.title: Road to the Playoffs - #12
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe and Joel Heyman discuss week four of college football, the MLB postseason, players on new teams, NFL sacks, and more!
attributes.description:
Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2NgQOnp. Tyler Coe and Joel Heyman discuss week four of college football, the MLB postseason, players on new teams, NFL sacks, and more!

Tyler and Joel also talk about what’s got them hot and bothered, the NBA preseason, seeing players in different jerseys, and make picks for football and baseball.

attributes.title: Should Student Athletes Get Paid? - #13
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe, Mia Khalifa, and Joel Heyman discuss college football, the NFL, the NBA, player entitlement, and more!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2EqtNiL. Tyler Coe, Mia Khalifa, and Joel Heyman discuss college football upsets, the NFL, the NBA season tip off, player entitlement, and more! This episode was recorded October 15, 2018.

attributes.title: Fans and Frothy Debates - #14
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe, Mia Khalifa, and Joel Heyman discuss Purdue's upset, the World Series, NBA fights, and interview special guest Ike Barinholtz!
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2S7T9oq. Tyler Coe, Mia Khalifa, and Joel Heyman discuss Purdue's upset of Ohio State, the World Series, the Lakers-Rockets fight, and more! And after the show, Tyler sits down with special guest Ike Barinholtz. This episode was recorded October 22, 2018, and is sponsored by Robinhood (http://bit.ly/2EEVBjI)

attributes.title: WWE Still Going to Saudi Arabia - #15
attributes.caption: Tyler Coe, Geoff Ramsey, and Eric Baudour discuss the best and worst sports moments, the end of the World Series, the WWE Crown Jewel event, and more! The guys also talk with Mariners pitcher Wade LeBlanc.
attributes.description: Download the audio version at http://bit.ly/2P2P7Qj. Tyler Coe, Geoff Ramsey, and Eric Baudour discuss the best and worst sports moments, the end of the World Series, the WWE Crown Jewel event, and more! The guys also talk with Mariners pitcher Wade LeBlanc. This episode was recorded October 29, 2018, and is sponsored by PUBG MOBILE (https://bit.ly/2SmBsBO, CODE: HOEZBZWJN)
